bug.author: EthanZhangYi
bug.description:
I pull the latest master branch and build it. Then I follow <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Microsoft/AirSim/blob/master/docs/unreal_blocks.md>this instruction</denchmark-link> to run the build-in block environment. And error occurs. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13479831/39693965-4b1a0406-5218-11e8-8737-be0a168b5d93.png></denchmark-link>
Window 10 Visual studio 2017 Community Version Unreal 4.18.3 Also, it seems that the block environment is not updated for VS2017 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13479831/39694067-9131e88c-5218-11e8-9f7c-eb896ad1ab02.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: There was one minor error in docs which I just fixed: Please use VS 2017 (not VS2015). Then select Blocks as Startup Project by right clicking in VS.
so even the name of "Block" is followed by(visual studio 2015), it should affect nothing, right?
This should be resolved in the current master. please re-open if you are still having issues.
